author: quark2
body:
#### PR description:
A new type of status plots are added; lumi-based status plots. It displays the change of statuses of chambers as a function of lumi-blocks (=time).

This is a backport to CMSSW_12_3_X of #37135.

#### PR validation:
Test are done and one can check again by `runTheMatrix` workflows

@jshlee @watson-ij
title: Lumi-based status plots, backport to CMSSW_12_3_X
